pages.text: This randomizer utilizes the fact that droppers dispense items in random order outputing a random signal strength whenever a signal is provided.$(br)Put items of varying stack size into the dropper. When you power the dropper, it will put an item into the hopper, turning on the comparator with a random signal strength of 1 or 3.
Materials: Dropper, Hopper, Comparator, energy input (Lever)
